title: Gitshock Swap
text: Gitshock Swap is a multinetwork decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator powered by GTFX token. We allow users to swap, create tokens, stake and create pool easier!

title: Kangaroo Wallets
text: Kangaroo brings payments infrastructure and fiat on/off ramp solutions to users, wallets and apps in the Gitshock Ecosystems.

title: Sitesia
text: One Of Utility Gitshock Finance, Sitesia is a platform that allows you to create your own website in a few minutes. You can create a website for your business, your blog, your portfolio, your online store, etc.

title: Gitshock Enterprise
text: Gitshock Enterprise is a platform building blockchain for business. We provide a suite of products and services to help businesses build, launch, and manage their own blockchain networks.

title: Neware Chain
text: Neware Chain is a blockchain based on Cosmos SDK, which is a blockchain framework that allows developers to build their own blockchain networks.
